com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.event

Class PinpointDBBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.event.PinpointDBBase

  • public class PinpointDBBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to access database through which applications can interact with tasks.
